title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 352.9 - Supervision during a violation proceeding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 352.9 - Supervision during a violation proceeding

State Regulations

The probation department shall continue supervision of the
probationer in a manner commensurate with the risk and needs of the probationer
and public safety during the pendency of a violation of probation
proceeding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
352.9

Amended

New

York State Register March 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 13, eff. 3/27/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
